#summary Mifare Classic Offline Cracker
= Introduction =

[https://www.nethemba.com/ Nethemba] have implemented and released an open source implementation of "offline nested" attack.

= Installation =
{{{
autoreconf -vis
./configure
make
}}}

= Usage =
Put one Mifare Classic tag that you want keys recovering;
Lauching mfoc, you will need to pass options, see
{{{
mfoc -h
}}}
